short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect and display SVGs from the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SVG Collector - The Ultimate Chrome Extension for Collecting, Copying, and Downloading SVGs

Are you a designer or developer looking for a fast and efficient way to work with SVG files? SVG Collector is the perfect Chrome extension for you! This lightweight yet powerful tool allows you to collect, copy, and download SVG elements from any website. Boost your web development workflow with this essential extension.
Key Features:
- Collects All SVGs on Any Website: Instantly gather all SVG graphics on a webpage, giving you easy access to the vector images you need.
- Copy SVG as HTML or JSX: Copy SVG elements as HTML code with a single click. If you work with React, seamlessly switch to JSX format for immediate use in your projects.
- Download SVG Files or Convert to PNG/JPG: Need to download an SVG? Click the download icon to save it to your computer. You can also convert SVGs to PNG or JPG formats to suit your project requirements.
- Optimizes and Minifies SVGs: Automatically optimizes and minifies SVGs for improved performance, ensuring that your downloaded files are clean and efficient.
- Fast and Seamless User Experience: Built for speed and efficiency, SVG Collector is optimized to keep your browser running smoothly without any lag.

Why Choose SVG Collector?
- High Performance: Designed to be fast and responsive, SVG Collector ensures that your browser remains quick, even when dealing with multiple SVGs.
- Lightweight and Easy to Use: The extension is lightweight and user-friendly, making it an effortless addition to your design and development toolkit.
- Perfect for Designers and Developers: Whether you're building websites, web applications, or working with vector graphics, SVG Collector is an essential tool to enhance your workflow.

Enhance Your Workflow
SVG Collector is crafted to streamline your productivity, allowing you to collect SVGs, copy them in the format you need, convert them to PNG/JPG, and download them effortlesslyâ€”all in just a few clicks.

We Value Your Feedback
We're committed to continuously improving SVG Collector. Your feedback is important to us, so please share your thoughts and suggestions to help us make this extension even better.

Download SVG Collector now and take your SVG workflow to the next level!
